<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <identifier>

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3074</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">History: Second Temple Period - Return to Zion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte: Zweite Bügel-Periode - gehen 
Sie zu Zion zurück</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire : La deuxième période de temple 
- revenez à Zion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History: Segundo período do temple - 
retorne a Zion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia: Secondo periodo del tempiale - 
ritorni a Zion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορία: Δεύτερη περίοδος ναών - επιστροφή σε 
Zion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia: Segundo período del templo - 
vuelva a Zion</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This page describes the History of the Jewish people in Biblical times, from the return from Babylon and erection of Second Temple to modern times.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biblical times</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">second temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Seite beschreibt die Geschichte der 
jüdischen Leute in den biblischen Zeiten, von der Rückkehr von 
Babylon und von der Aufrichtung des zweiten Bügels zu den modernen 
Zeiten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette page décrit l'histoire des personnes 
juives dans des périodes bibliques, du retour de Babylone et de la 
construction du deuxième temple aux temps modernes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta página descreve o history dos povos jewish 
em épocas biblical, do retorno de Babylon e da ereção do segundo 
temple às épocas modernas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa pagina descrive la storia della gente 
ebrea nei periodi biblici, dal ritorno da Babylon e dalla costruzione 
del secondo tempiale ai periodi moderni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η σελίδα περιγράφει την ιστορία των εβραϊκών 
ανθρώπων στους βιβλικούς χρόνους, από την επιστροφή από 
Babylon και την ανέγερση του δεύτερου ναού στους σύγχρονους 
χρόνους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta paginación describe la historia de la gente
judía en épocas bíblicas, de la vuelta de Babylon y de la erección
del segundo templo a las épocas modernas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">biblische Zeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">zweiter Bügel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">périodes bibliques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">deuxième temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Babylone</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">épocas biblical</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">segundo temple</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">periodi biblici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">secondo tempiale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">βιβλικοί χρόνοι</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεύτερος ναός</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">épocas bíblicas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">segundo templo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Babylon</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
